## Buckets.pushPath() method

Pushes a file to a bucket path.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pushPath(key: string, path: string, input: any, ctx?: ContextInterface, opts?: {
        progress?: (num?: number) => void;
    }): Promise<PushPathResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Unique (IPNS compatible) identifier key for a bucket. |
|  path | string | A file/object (sub)-path within a bucket. |
|  input | any | The input file/stream/object. |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |
|  opts | { progress?: (num?: number) =&gt; void; } | Options to control response stream. Currently only supports a progress function.  This will return the resolved path and the bucket's new root path. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PushPathResult](./hub.pushpathresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
